    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractNetwork
    Represents a generic network structure in a simulation.
    AbstractNetworkSampler
    Abstract base class for network throughput sampling in a simulation environment.
    AbstractNodeFactory
    Abstract factory class for creating IMiner instances.
    AbstractNodeSampler
    Abstract base class for node sampling within the CNSim engine.
    AbstractTransactionSampler
    A sampler for Transaction objects.
    BeliefEntry
    Represents a unique belief entry of a node regarding a transaction in a simulation.
    BeliefEntryCounter
    Maintains average values for BeliefEntry occurrences for generating short belief reporting.
    CommandLineOption
    Annotation used to define command-line options for the CommandLineParser.
    CommandLineParser
    Parses command line arguments for the CNSim simulator.
    Config
     
    ConfigInitializer
    Initialize Config by combining command line arguments and configuration file settings.
    ConfigurationException
     
    Debug
    A quick way to way to add, enable and disable debug messages.
    Event
    Represents a single discrete occurrence within the event-driven simulation.
    Event_BehaviorChange
    Represents an event that changes the behavior of a node in the simulation.
    Event_ContainerArrival
    Represents an event that signifies the arrival of a propagated transaction container (e.g., a validated block) at a particular node within the simulation network.
    Event_ContainerValidation
    Represents a simulation event where a node validates a container, such as a block.
    Event_HashPowerChange
    Represents an event that changes the hashpower of a node in the simulation.
    Event_NewTransactionArrival
    Represents an event corresponding to the arrival of a new external (client) transaction at a node within the simulation.
    Event_Report_BeliefReport
    Represents an event that triggers a belief report for all nodes in the simulation, relative to a set of sample transactions, defined in the configuration.
    Event_Report_NodeStatusReport
    Represents an event that triggers a node status report for all nodes in the simulation.
    Event_Report_StructureReport
    Represents an event that triggers a structure report for all nodes in the simulation.
    Event_SeedUpdate
    Represents an event for updating the random seed of a multi-sowable sampler within the simulation.
    Event_TransactionPropagation
    Represents an event for the propagation of a transaction within the simulation.
    EventTimeComparator
    Comparator for Event objects based on their scheduled time.
    FileBasedEndToEndNetwork
    Represents a network where end-to-end throughput is loaded from a CSV file.
    FileBasedNodeSampler
    Node sampler that reads node characteristics from a CSV file.
    FileBasedTransactionSampler
    Transaction sampler that reads transaction information from a CSV file.
    IMiner
    Represents a network node within the simulation.
    IMultiSowable
    Interface for objects that can update their seed for random number generation.
    INode
     
    ISowable
    Interface for objects that can be sown with a seed for random number generation.
    IStructure
    Interface for ledger structure, e.g. a blockchain or a DAG.
    ITxContainer
    Defines the main methods that a transaction containing type must include.
    NetworkFactory
    Factory class for creating AbstractNetwork instances.
    NetworkSamplerFactory
    Factory class for creating instances of AbstractNetworkSampler.
    Node
    Abstract class representing a node in a blockchain network.
    NodeSamplerFactory
    Factory class responsible for constructing and configuring instances of AbstractNodeSampler used in simulation runs.
    NodeSet
     
    PoWNode
    Abstract class representing a node in a blockchain network.
    PoWNodeSet
    Represents a collection of IMiner objects participating in a network simulation.
    ProgressBar
     
    RandomEndToEndNetwork
    Represents a network with random end-to-end connections between nodes.
    Reporter
    Provides centralized measurement and reporting for simulations.
    ReportEventFactory
    Factory class for scheduling periodic Event_Report_BeliefReport events in a Simulation.
    Sampler
    Acts as a container of different kinds of Samplers and offers some basic sampling methods.
    SeedManager
    Manages a circular sequence of random seeds for simulations.
    Simulation
    The central class of any simulation
    SimulatorFactory
    A factory class responsible for constructing and assembling all the main components of a Simulation instance.
    StandardNetworkSampler
     
    StandardNodeSampler
    A standard implementation of the AbstractNodeSampler.
    StandardTransactionSampler
    A standard implementation of AbstractTransactionSampler.
    Transaction
     
    TransactionGroup
    A list containing various transactions.
    TransactionSamplerFactory
    Factory class responsible for creating instances of AbstractTransactionSampler based on whether a file-based or random sampling strategy is required.
    TransactionWorkload
    Represents a workload of transactions, which can be generated either from a file or using a sampler.
    TxConflictRegistry
     
    TxDependencyRegistry
     
    TxSizeComparator
     
    TxValueComparator
     
    TxValuePerSizeComparator
